channel.title: Deluxe - innovative (459 remake?)
channel.description:
[ul][list][list][list][list][list][list][list][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/543/deluxem.png/][IMG]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/6646/deluxem.png[/img][/URL]
[i]deluxe is derived towards perfection. The base that I'm building off is Project Insanity. Now before you spread your bullshit all over the place, this Project Insanity has been proven to hold up to 2,000 bots. I plan to add fruitful content, and make this development a dedicated one.[/i]
[i][b]I've decided to make this a 459 development, therefore there won't be anything above 459 (I'll have to strictly look into the revision). There will be a real 459 website as well. I need to update the pictures, which I will do shortly.[/b][/i]
[size=20pt][b]Miscellaneous Content[/b][/size]
[list] [li]PathFinding system[/li] [li]Clipped npc's[/li] [li]Resource cleaning[/li] [li]Region system[/li] [li]Hyperion's event system[/li] [li]Pools[/li] [li]Memory leaks fixed[/li] [li]Npc's don't cross walk (go over each other), same with npc's and players[/li] [li]Hyperion's game engine[/li] [li]Hyperion's task system[/li] [li]30 day membership system[/li] [li]474 npc's[/li] [li]Random event system[/li] [/list]
[b][size=12pt]Minigames[/size][/b]
Warriors guild - all monsters, perfected floors, defenders, animated armours and a token system Duel arena - all the options work (stake etc), still some bugs along with dupes Castle wars - everything works except underground; need to fix some bugs Fight pits - timers, winning, interface and reward Fight caves - only one wave, but that's for debugging (will be 63) Barrows - digging, spawning - no tunnel Pest Control - no interface, no boat waiting, no npcs, no portals Fishing trawler - boat waiting room, random rewards Gnome ball -
[b][size=12pt]Skills[/size][/b]
Time will tell itself....
[b][size=12pt]Travelling[/size][/b]
Amulet of glory - re-charging, all teleports and degrades Games necklace - all teleports Boat system - every single boat works, with timers etc Canoe system - ..... Gnome glider - all locations, correct interfaces and timers Spirit tree - .....
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2vba8u1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/m81pnk.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/sl03ft.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/4r5e0n.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/300tids.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/35a6n0z.png[/img][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul]

getting every single boat etc…

Good Luck on your project

item.title: Deluxe - innovative (459 remake?)
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[ul][list][list][list][list][list][list][list]

deluxe is derived towards perfection. The base that I’m building off is Project Insanity. Now before you spread your bullshit all over the place, this Project Insanity has been proven to hold up to 2,000 bots. I plan to add fruitful content, and make this development a dedicated one.

I’ve decided to make this a 459 development, therefore there won’t be anything above 459 (I’ll have to strictly look into the revision). There will be a real 459 website as well. I need to update the pictures, which I will do shortly.

[size=20pt]Miscellaneous Content[/size]

[list]
[li]PathFinding system[/li]
[li]Clipped npc’s[/li]
[li]Resource cleaning[/li]
[li]Region system[/li]
[li]Hyperion’s event system[/li]
[li]Pools[/li]
[li]Memory leaks fixed[/li]
[li]Npc’s don’t cross walk (go over each other), same with npc’s and players[/li]
[li]Hyperion’s game engine[/li]
[li]Hyperion’s task system[/li]
[li]30 day membership system[/li]
[li]474 npc’s[/li]
[li]Random event system[/li]
[/list]

[size=12pt]Minigames[/size]

Warriors guild - all monsters, perfected floors, defenders, animated armours and a token system
Duel arena - all the options work (stake etc), still some bugs along with dupes
Castle wars - everything works except underground; need to fix some bugs
Fight pits - timers, winning, interface and reward
Fight caves - only one wave, but that’s for debugging (will be 63)
Barrows - digging, spawning - no tunnel
Pest Control - no interface, no boat waiting, no npcs, no portals
Fishing trawler - boat waiting room, random rewards
Gnome ball -

[size=12pt]Skills[/size]

Time will tell itself…

Amulet of glory - re-charging, all teleports and degrades
Games necklace - all teleports
Boat system - every single boat works, with timers etc
Canoe system - …
Gnome glider - all locations, correct interfaces and timers
Spirit tree - …
